jobDescription: A 19-year old first year Berkeley student studying microbiology. Passionate for biotech.
aboutText: I'm Siri Tantry, a 19-year-old first year Berkeley student studying microbiology. As a passionate biotechnologist, I bring a wealth of knowledge and experience to the table. My background in microbiology, combined with my expertise in NMR analysis, proton and carbon NMR, column chromatography, and recrystalization, gives me a unique capability to understand and solve complex problems. Furthermore, my hobbies like singing, dancing, reading, and outdoorsy stuff have helped cultivate my creativity, which I bring to my work.
